tgt_original: deśavijñaptir (9)  vyavahāravijñapatiḥ (10)  svaparaviśeṣavijñaptiḥ (11)  sugatidurgaticyutyupapat- tivijñaptiś ca |
tadupabhogya- vijñaptis (5)  tadupabhogavijñapatiś ca (6-9)  yā cādhvasaṁ- khyādeśavyavahāravijñaptis tā abhilāpavāsanābījahetoḥ |
yā ca (11) sugatidurgaticyutyupapattivijñaptis tā bhavāṅga- vāsanābījahetoḥ |
